text.init_desc: Your path is blocked by a large mountain. Paths run to the east and south.
You have arrived at a busy town. There are all kinds of crazy characters here.
From here you can see a glorious ocean view. Paths lead north and west.
You are standing in front of a wide river which you cannot cross.
You see a stream flowing from the west.
You've arrived at a cliff edge, which runs north-south.
You are standing in an open field, surrounded by strange looking plants.
This is a large crater, apparently some kind of impact site.

dug.0: The earth is soft here. You may be able to dig.
dug.1: At your feet there is a small hole.

text.init_desc: You are in a forest. Paths run to the south and west.

shovel.name: Shovel
shovel.init_desc: You notice a shovel lying on the ground.

diamond.name: Diamond
diamond.init_desc: Inside is an enormous diamond, probably worth an absolute fortune!
